product_name: On Cloudsurfer Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Equipped with CloudTec(R) soles, the women's On Cloudsurfer Running Shoes are light, agile and excellent at transforming running energy into forward momentum when you're training or racing. Adaptive soles balance every step and activate your postural muscles. Cloudsurfer shoes intelligently combine what conventional running shoes have failed to unite: a cushioned landing and a barefoot takeoff. Sleek uppers with a light microfiber 3D air-mesh enable optimal air intake and cooling. Minimalist translucent eyestays save weight and allow for easy yet precise lace adjustment. Rubber outsoles provide good traction. On Cloudsurfer Running Shoes for women are deal for experienced runners who are looking to build up foot stability. Closeout.
short_description: Equipped with CloudTec(R) soles, the women's On Cloudsurfer Running Shoes are light, agile and excellent at transforming running energy into forward momentum when you're training or racing.
